items.instruction: Create a new user account on the domain controller - RFSERVER.

description.content: The naming convention for the AD account is: firstname.lastname

Important: In case the new employee needs access to SSLVPN you need to seek approval from Earl Henton before proceeding
you can then assign them to the SSLVPN security group and tick "Allow access" under the AD object Dial-in tab.

items.instruction: Login to Revolution Fibres O365 and create a new O365 account.

description.content:
The naming convention is: firstname.lastname@nanolayr.com 
Provision the following license from the CSP portal and assign the new account these licenses:

Office 365 Business Premium / M365 Business Standard
ATP license

please ask the requestor to specify a user with the same/similar permissions as the new starter and compare their groups.
Make sure user is added to all@rev group
Must assign:
NanoLayr Team
Health & Safety
Wellness
When requesting the new user, they will also specify what other groups, e.g. Production, SMT, Engineer, etc., should be added to.

Note - Add user to "Health and Safety" Channel on Teams - its required for each new user.

items.instruction: Verify that the printer is mapped

description.content: Printer is mapped with the GPO tied to the "Printer - Ricoh MP C2004ex" security group

items.instruction: Add User to the relevant Signature

description.content:
LOGIN to Exclaimer Portal:
Open 'Revolution Fibres' Signature management by pressing 'Launch'. 
Add User to the relevant Signature by adding from 'Select Senders'

items.instruction: Setup Outlook calendar settings to Week number view

description.content: Check the attachment to enable week number view on the Outlook calendar.

items.instruction: Ensure outlook is set as the default mail application and pinned to the task bar
Ensure the Outlook client has the Teams add-in setup

description.content: (automatically gets installed with teams check it's not disabled)

items.instruction: Set the user up with Room calendars

description.content: Top right 3 dots and click add -> from Room list and add all the calendars for the user.

items.instruction: Set the startup page of the default web browser to Nanolayr's sharepoint home page
Ensure user is signed into teams and it is pinned on the task bar
Contact the requestor on the day to go through all checks prior to the users arrival.
Update the contact in the ticket with the details of the new user

description.content:
We have completed setting up the account for ____, please find the details below:

Computer login
username: (AD Username, i.e. firstname.lastname)
password: (send the link from https://1ty.me/) Note: The password link expires once it is opened.

Office 365 Account
email address: (firstname.lastname@revolutionfibres.com)
password: (send the link from https://1ty.me/) Note: The password link expires once it is opened

We will contact the user once they start, to assist with enabling 2FA on their Office 365 account

items.instruction: Re-schedule this ticket to the next day after the new employee starts and set up 2FA for them.

description.content:
Link to the MFA Setup Guide using the new employee's mobile number:
[MFA Setup Guide](https://lancom.itglue.com/5537/docs/5360023)

2FA method is via a text on their mobile number
Once 2FA is setup, change it to Enforced in O365 admin portal for this new employee.
